response.overview: Offering a vivid depiction of America's World War II campaign in Europe, the series employs war footage taken from the U.S. Army, Navy and Coast Guard, the British War Office, the National Film Board of Canada and captured Nazi materials. The program highlights strategic sessions with Allied and Axis power leaders and generals. Narrated by Westbrook Van Hoorhis and Hugh James.
response.tagline: Be an eyewitness to one of the greatest campaigns in history through 26 fascinating episodes!
response.title: War In Europe
